TopicTitle: swtching to orbital map gives electric charge

Articles.Content:
Hopefully im putting this in the right section of forums lol

but i launched an unmanned science lab intended to go to minmus, while in orbit of kerbin and behind it, i deployed the large solar arrays. then switched to map view and noticed my electric charge went up...did this a view times and all of a sudden im back at full charge.

Just thought i would mention this just in case anyone else wants to try and replicate this.

EDIT: just messed with it more, it only gives my charge if the arrays are out and i switch to map view.
